title: Senior Frontend Developer
description: We're looking for a Senior Frontend Developer to join our growing team. You'll be responsible for building and maintaining our web applications, working with modern technologies like React, TypeScript, and Next.js. You'll collaborate with designers, product managers, and backend developers to create exceptional user experiences.
responsibilities: Develop and maintain high-quality web applications
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define features
Write clean, maintainable, and well-tested code
Mentor junior developers and conduct code reviews
Stay up-to-date with emerging technologies and best practices
requirements: 5+ years of experience in frontend development
Strong proficiency in JavaScript, TypeScript, and React
Experience with modern build tools and testing frameworks
Understanding of web performance and accessibility
Excellent communication and collaboration skills
benefits: Comprehensive health, dental, and vision insurance
Flexible work arrangements and remote options
niceToHave: Experience with Next.js and server-side rendering
Knowledge of design systems and component libraries
Familiarity with backend technologies and APIs
Open source contributions and community involvement

title: Backend Engineer
description: Join our backend team to build scalable, high-performance systems that power our platform. You'll work with cutting-edge technologies and help architect solutions that can handle millions of users.
responsibilities: Design and implement backend services and APIs
Optimize database queries and system performance
Write clean, maintainable code with comprehensive tests
Collaborate with frontend and DevOps teams
Participate in system design and architecture decisions
requirements: 3+ years of backend development experience
Proficiency in Python, Go, or Node.js
Experience with relational and NoSQL databases
Knowledge of microservices and distributed systems
Understanding of cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, or Azure)
niceToHave: Experience with Kubernetes and Docker
Knowledge of message queues and event streaming
Familiarity with monitoring and observability tools
Contributions to open source projects

title: Full Stack Developer
description: We're seeking a Full Stack Developer to join our dynamic team. You'll work on both frontend and backend development, helping to build and maintain our web applications and APIs.
responsibilities: Develop full-stack web applications
Build and maintain RESTful APIs
Create responsive and accessible user interfaces
Collaborate with designers and product managers
Write clean, maintainable code with tests
requirements: 3+ years of full-stack development experience
Proficiency in JavaScript/TypeScript and React
Experience with Node.js and Express
Knowledge of SQL databases and ORMs
Understanding of web fundamentals and best practices
niceToHave: Experience with Next.js or similar frameworks
Knowledge of GraphQL and API design
Familiarity with cloud platforms
Understanding of DevOps practices

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Join our DevOps team to build and maintain our infrastructure and deployment pipelines. You'll work with cutting-edge technologies to ensure our systems are reliable, scalable, and secure.
responsibilities: Design and implement CI/CD pipelines
Manage cloud infrastructure and services
Monitor system performance and reliability
Implement security best practices
Automate deployment and configuration processes
requirements: 5+ years of DevOps or infrastructure experience
Strong knowledge of AWS, Azure, or GCP
Experience with Kubernetes and Docker
Proficiency in scripting languages (Python, Bash)
Understanding of networking and security principles
niceToHave: Experience with Terraform and infrastructure as code
Knowledge of monitoring and observability tools
Familiarity with microservices architecture
Understanding of compliance and security frameworks

title: UI/UX Designer
description: We're looking for a talented UI/UX Designer to create beautiful and intuitive user experiences. You'll work closely with our product and engineering teams to design solutions that delight our users.
responsibilities: Create user-centered design solutions
Design user interfaces and user experiences
Conduct user research and usability testing
Create wireframes, prototypes, and design systems
Collaborate with cross-functional teams
requirements: 3+ years of UI/UX design experience
Proficiency in design tools (Figma, Sketch, Adobe)
Understanding of user-centered design principles
Experience with design systems and component libraries
Strong portfolio showcasing your work
niceToHave: Experience with prototyping tools
Knowledge of frontend development
Understanding of accessibility standards
Experience with user research methods

title: Product Manager
description: Join our product team to drive the vision and strategy for our products. You'll work with stakeholders across the organization to define product roadmaps and ensure successful delivery.
responsibilities: Define product vision and strategy
Create and maintain product roadmaps
Gather and prioritize product requirements
Work with engineering and design teams
Analyze market trends and competitive landscape
requirements: 5+ years of product management experience
Strong analytical and strategic thinking skills
Experience with agile development methodologies
Excellent communication and leadership abilities
Understanding of technology and user experience
niceToHave: Experience in SaaS or B2B products
Knowledge of data analysis and metrics
Familiarity with user research methods
Understanding of business strategy and operations

title: Frontend Developer (Entry Level)
description: Start your career as a Frontend Developer with our growing team. You'll learn modern web development technologies and work on real projects that impact our users.
responsibilities: Develop user interfaces using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Learn and work with modern frameworks like React
Collaborate with senior developers on projects
Write clean, maintainable code
Participate in code reviews and team meetings
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
Basic knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Understanding of web development fundamentals
Strong problem-solving and learning abilities
Excellent communication and teamwork skills
niceToHave: Experience with React or similar frameworks
Knowledge of version control (Git)
Understanding of responsive design
Familiarity with web accessibility

title: Backend Developer (Contract)
description: We're looking for a senior backend developer to help us build and scale our APIs. This is a 6-month contract position with the possibility of extension.
responsibilities: Design and implement backend services
Optimize database performance and queries
Write clean, maintainable code with tests
Collaborate with frontend and DevOps teams
Document APIs and technical specifications
requirements: 5+ years of backend development experience
Proficiency in Python, Java, or Node.js
Experience with microservices architecture
Knowledge of cloud platforms and databases
Strong problem-solving and communication skills
niceToHave: Experience with Kubernetes and Docker
Knowledge of GraphQL and API design
Familiarity with monitoring and logging tools
Understanding of security best practices
